title: Top Places to visit in Lanka, Assam
content: Lanka is a town and a town area committee in Hojai district in the Indian state of Assam. Lanka's name is probably given after the name Lanka of Ramayana. Assamese poet Madhava Kandali was said to be an inhabitant of Lanka, who wrote Saptakanda Ramayana, under the patronage of Varāha-Rājā Mahaman
